title: (x) Sunrise pictural display face - Sunrise {Brown Fox}
content:
Anyone? Thanks a lot!

Life goes on" condensed sans - Folio Cond {Conor} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021123911/http:/typophile.com/node/31007 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Brown Fox

comments.content: Look at a typeface like [Copal](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021123911/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/helvetica_alternatives.cfm) and gets ta drawin’.

Just found it myself: It’s called - who’d guessed it - “Sunrise”. My feeling is that it was released by Letraset - though i don’t have a specimenbook at home to check. Also, I don’t think it has ever been digitised properly?

Good night

Ahum, don’t know how proper the digitization is but there is one [Eastern Sunrise](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021123911/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=sunrise&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=C.A.&nb_ppp=10&psize=l&classt=alpha) at Dafont.com. Done by [Renn Crump](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021123911/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/renncrump/).
